achievementsAndResponsibilities.description: Found bug in Electron.js while working on specific project task, reported to Electron Team on GitHub - Issue: #30277, Fixed Issue by PR: #30305.
2,53,000+ people reached Impact, 900+ Reputations on Stack Overflow.
Solved 500+ coding problems of LeetCode / HackerRank / HackerEarth / CodeChef / CodeForces / GeekForGeeks.
Core technical team member of Knowledge Circle, JMI (2018-present) for maintaining GitHub repos & website, which includes ~100 entrance papers shared by students from across the country.

workContributions.description: Worked on Web Animations API to develop 30-40 poker game & application UI animations for cards, themes, tournaments, etc.
Developed well-structured react components & managed the state of application using MobX-State-Tree.
Worked on more than 50 minor/critical bugs & improvement tasks which results in performance benefits.
Trained & mentored 40 software engineering interns on JavaScript/TypeScript, React.js, SCSS, Analysis & Designing Aspects, Application State Management, Routing, etc.
Worked on code refactoring across the project for enhancing the codebase quality.
Found & solved several bugs like ESLint, Web-Storm IDE errors & warnings, UI bugs, etc.
Developed more than 20 React UI components.
Learned & worked with libraries/frameworks such as React.js, React Native, Redux, React Router, SCSS, Material UI, Styled Components, etc.
